title: The Problem with Deep Space Travel

media:group.media:title: The Problem with Deep Space Travel
media:group.media:description:
Get 1 year of both Nebula and CuriosityStream for just 14.79 here: http://curiositystream.com/realscience using the code "realscience"

Watch this video ad-free on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/realscience-why-we-need-to-genetically-modify-astronauts

New streaming platform: https://watchnebula.com/
